title: Customer Service Skills Within Healthcare
headline: Learn how to provide outstanding customer service to patients with the skills provided in this free online course.
description: Healthcare is a customer service industry and excellent service plays a key role in restoring patients to health and defining their expectations. The sensitive nature of medical interactions makes patient customer service training imperative. This course explores the relationship between patients and healthcare-providers and explains how to provide customer service that preserves the health, privacy and dignity of those in your care.

courseDescription:
Though patients are seldom seen as ‘customers’, happy and satisfied patient customers make or break a healthcare facility. Healthcare demands qualified and professional staff who can deliver fast and friendly service with empathy. This creates a demand for specialised customer service professionals trained to handle patients and work in the healthcare industry. This course is tailor-made to improve your skills and equips you with all the tools and techniques used to provide an outstanding experience to patients.

This healthcare customer service course establishes the importance of customer service and examines its elements. We help you improve your verbal and non-verbal communication skills and lay out the best ways to communicate with patients. This includes providing the most effective techniques to handle complaints, manage angry or difficult patients and other must-have soft skills required to provide effective customer service in healthcare contexts. The course demonstrates how to organise a filing system that provides easy access to patient information and how to schedule appointments while maintaining a positive image in front of customers. 

This course is designed for healthcare professionals who want to improve their customer service skills. The course also meets the needs of social workers and those working as medical support staff who interact with patients and their loved ones. We train you in the art of building a bond with patients by communicating professionally with appropriate body language in a way that defuses tension created by unruly or angry customers. Healthcare prevents a sensitive professional environment that demands specialised customer service skills so sign up to learn how to keep patients satisfied and calm as you restore their health.
